questions:

B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

B) At the beach
C) In a forest
D) Inside a museum

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

A) Buildings
B) People
C) Natural landscape
D) Animals

B) A group of people

D) Flowers

C) Palm trees

B) Flowing rapidly
C) Muddy and turbulent

D) The rocks form a bridge over the water

C) The vegetation is only in the background
